string.text:
Firewood suitable for a campfire. Helps keep warm at night and provides the opportunity to cook food.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for making campfires
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] may be collected with an Axe
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] right-click on Axe when near a tree > 'chop wood'
